dublinCore.dc:title: 118 HR 6683 IH: Preserving Seniors’ Access to Physicians Act of 2023
dublinCore.dc:rights: Pursuant to Title 17 Section 105 of the United States Code, this file is not subject to copyright protection and is in the public domain.

action.action-desc: Mr. Murphy (for himself, Mr. Davis of Illinois, Mr. Wenstrup, Mr. Burgess, Mr. Panetta, and Mr. Bucshon) introduced the following bill; which was referred to the Committee on Energy and Commerce, and in addition to the Committee on Ways and Means, for a period to be subsequently determined by the Speaker, in each case for consideration of such provisions as fall within the jurisdiction of the committee concerned

form.official-title: To amend title XVIII of the Social Security Act to increase support for physicians and other practitioners in adjusting to Medicare payment changes.

section.text: This Act may be cited as the Preserving Seniors’ Access to Physicians Act of 2023.

section.header: Increasing support for physicians and other practitioners in adjusting to Medicare payment changes
section.text: Section 1848(t)(1)(D) of the Social Security Act (42 U.S.C. 1395w–4(t)(1)(D)) is amended by striking 1.25 percent and inserting 4.62 percent.
Section 1941(b)(3)(A) of the Social Security Act (42 U.S.C. 1396w–1(b)(3)(A)) is amended by striking $5,796,117,810 and inserting $3,973,117,810.
